sentences.english: She desires the connexion as warmly as your uncle or myself.
sentences.chinese: 她像你姨父或我一樣希望這門親事能成。

sentences.english: Uncle Vernon suddenly found his voice.
sentences.chinese: 這時弗農姨父好像突然吃了豹子膽。

sentences.english: Her uncle looked at her awhile with genial acuteness.
sentences.chinese: 姨父看了她一眼，目光顯得和藹而犀利。

sentences.english: ‘I would like to talk first to your nucle, Albert King, ’Inspector Walsh said.
sentences.chinese: “我想先和你的姨父艾伯特金談談，”沃爾什探長說。

sentences.english: Well, your uncle Albert wanted money. Tom Briggs wanted the garden.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，你的艾伯特姨父要錢，湯姆布里格斯想要花園。

sentences.english: He was about to go back upstairs when Uncle Vernon actually spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他正要上樓回房，弗農姨父真說話了。

sentences.english: Uncle Vernon and Aunt Petunia kept looking at each other darkly.
sentences.chinese: 佩妮姨媽和弗農姨父則面色陰沉地看着對方。

sentences.english: Uncle Vernon jokingly makes a stab at a connection between magic carpets and wizards.
sentences.chinese: 弗農姨父挖苦式地試圖在飛毯和魔法師之間建立聯繫。

sentences.english: Uncle Albert wanted her money for his wife, Annie.
sentences.chinese: 艾伯特姨父想要她的錢給他妻子安妮。

sentences.english: I've come to bring Harry to his aunt and uncle.
sentences.chinese: 我是來接哈利，把他送到他姨媽姨父家的。

sentences.english: My aunt and uncle and cousin are, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我的姨父和姨媽就很差勁。

sentences.english: go upstairs and tell Uncle Albert and Jackie.
sentences.chinese: 咱們上樓去告訴艾伯特姨父和傑基。

sentences.english: Uncle Vernon tapped on the glass, but the snake didn't budge.
sentences.chinese: 弗農姨父敲了幾下玻璃，但是那蛇動也不動一下。

sentences.english: My cousin John is the child of my uncle.
sentences.chinese: 我的表第約翰是我姨父的孩子。

sentences.english: Uncle Vernon made another funny noise, like a mouse being trodden on.
sentences.chinese: 弗農姨父發出一聲像是老鼠被人踩到似的怪叫。

definition: mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
husband of older female cousin via female line
father's sister's husband/husband of paternal aunt/uncle
wife of older male cousin via female line
father's female cousin via female line
older male cousin via female line
older male cousin via female line
